message: This is the first product. I'm offering it to you for $1000000. It's a great deal, but I have to warn you that the product might not be what you expect. If you're not sure, you can always wait for the next round.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your honesty. I'll wait for the next round to make my decision.

I see you're a cautious buyer! I appreciate that. This product is actually a repeat of the previous one. I'm offering it to you for the same price of $1000000. If you're still unsure, I can offer you a slight discount to $950000, but I'm not sure how long I can hold out on this price.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I think it's best if I continue waiting for the next round. I want to ensure I get the best value for my money.

I understand your caution, Bob. I'll make you a deal. If you buy this product, I'll throw in a free inspection service. One of my experts will examine the product and provide a detailed report on its quality. If it's not up to your standards, I'll give you a full refund. The price remains the same at $1000000.

Thank you for the offer, Alice, but I think it's better for me to wait until I find a product that meets my expectations without any additional costs. I appreciate your willingness to accommodate my concerns.

I understand your concerns, Bob. I'll make it simple. I'll offer you a 'no-questions-asked' return policy. This is a one-time offer, and I'm not sure how long I can keep it on the table.
